definition: good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
good/very/very much
cause/reason/karma/fate/predestined affinity/margin/hem/edge/along
to earn people's praise through one's good deeds (idiom)

sentences.english: To sentiment reason which late comes, treasures well, no longer error predestined match.
sentences.chinese: 對遲來的情緣，好好珍惜，不再錯失良緣。

sentences.english: John and Leanne were married six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前，約翰和莉安喜結良緣。

sentences.english: I'm sure you'll all join me in wishing Ted and Laura a very happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我相信大家會願意與我一起共祝特德和勞拉喜結良緣。

sentences.english: Two months later, they were married and he was off to war.
sentences.chinese: 兩個月後，他們喜結良緣，隨後父親便奔赴戰場。

sentences.english: Start with gentle pecks and tongue-free kisses as you get to know someone.
sentences.chinese: 先從輕輕啄及舌吻免費爲你結識了良緣。

sentences.english: Thee Chinese people refer to a good relationship as "a bond of gold and jade."
sentences.chinese: 中國人將美好的姻緣稱爲“金玉良緣”。

sentences.english: Two months later, they got married, and then, my father went to war.
sentences.chinese: 兩個月後，他們喜結良緣，隨後父親便奔赴戰場。

sentences.english: New couples will tie the knot in the beautiful French-style garden within the pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 而今朝，新婚夫婦將在國館的大方的園中喜結良緣。

sentences.english: " He called the proposed acquisition a "marriage made in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他稱該項收購提議是一個“天造地設的良緣”。

sentences.english: Tom and Mary exchanged their vows before the altar.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆和瑪麗在聖壇前，山盟海誓永結良緣。

sentences.english: Every year in China more than ten million couples tie the knot.
sentences.chinese: 中國每年有超過一千萬的新人喜結良緣。

sentences.english: Married, carefully designed, home built with love.
sentences.chinese: 喜結良緣，用心設計，以愛築家。

sentences.english: Perhaps, some things are doomed to have it, take Golden fate God bestows. speaking.
sentences.chinese: 或許，有的事情是已經註定的吧，就拿金玉良緣來說。

sentences.english: Yet, she also longs for her own perfect match3.
sentences.chinese: 但是她也渴望自己的美好良緣。

sentences.english: It would be exciting, if I could marry couples above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 如果能在雲端見證新人們喜結良緣，那一定會很激動。

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to amuse/to divert/happy/joyful/pleasure/amusement
see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]
(in former times) to bind one's hair on coming of age
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
two trees that grow together as one/fig. conjugal union
everything/every matter
great catastrophe
achieving nothing
rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers/fig. mutual sensitivity/tacit exchange of romantic feelings/a meeting of minds
person with foresight
to get married
to cater to sb to make them happy (esp. of one's parents)
happiness/joy/to be happy/to be joyous
to be successful in business/professional success
